timeline.bodyText:
Isn't this rather warning/error than info? My thoughts were all channels in kogito should have an envelope. Have just some of them the envelope?
Or is it that small subparts/panels/components of editor can have registered different shortcuts so it will be quite common that no envelope is present?

replies.bodyText: Changed to 'debug'. The envelope is needed on all channels. This 'debug' message will be displayed on BC, since there's no envelope available there.

timeline.bodyText: I think we could remove gwt-user from appformer-kogito-bridge as that has dependency for appformer-client-api and mvn dependency:analyze reports gwt-user as unused in appformer-kogito-bridge. WDYT?
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText:
Ok then I think we need
    <dependency>
      <groupId>com.google.gwt</groupId>
      <artifactId>gwt-user</artifactId>
      <scope>provided</scope>
    </dependency>

in appformer-kogito-bridge as we import  appformer-client-api there. WDYT?
replies.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText: Dependencies with scope provided are not transitive.
